titles.title: Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017
To amend title 14, United States Code, to improve the organization of such title and to incorporate certain transfers and modifications into such title, and for other purposes.
Coast Guard Improvement and Reform Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-132.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 81.

action.text: Mr. Hunter moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1726.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
